CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 14, 1962, pg. 9 reads: "Guests Of Squaws - ...guests at the Squaws' "Cotton Extravaganza" at the Hilton Hotel last Thursday night..."
TitMainTitle: Man, and woman wearing dark sleeveless dress with scalloped trim, seated together on sofa, in Hilton Hotel for Squaw Club's "Cotton Extravaganza"
